title: Unified inbox sync
creator: david514
content: The unified inbox will not sync. I have three email accounts and in order to get them to sync or gather mail, I have to open each individual inbox and sync them. It is very annoying because the whole idea of a unified inbox would be being able to review all incoming mail in one screen! Any solutions, please?
